page.title: 06Events
page.content: The biennial Festival, runs for approximately a fortnight in May. It caters for all tastes and includes classical music, pop music, theatrical performances and social gatherings. Events are held in various venues such as the Memorial Hall, local school halls and private homes. Some performers are professional artistes and some local amateurs. The organisers are a Committee of local enthusiasts who give their time voluntarily to bringing culture and entertainment to the town and surrounding villages. The town also has an annual "Quiz" when local organisations, offices and firms enter teams to compete for a trophy by answering questions on a diversity of subjects. There is a series of eliminating rounds ending in a final between the two best teams.
